title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for solving student's f'(x)=0

1 point is earned for answer, y= number

1 point is earned for consistent answer

f ′ ( x )=0 when x =−1,0,1

x = −1 ⇒ f( x ) = 4 ; y = 4

f( 0 ) = 2 ; y = 2

f( 1 )= 0 ; y = 0
descriptions:

x = −1 ⇒ f( x ) = 4 ; y = 4

f( 1 )= 0 ; y = 0
